elastic.tests module¶

class elastic.tests.TestIndexation(methodName='runTest')[source]¶

Bases: TestCase

Test case for indexation functionality.

test_index_article()[source]¶

Test the index_article_view function.

This test case simulates a POST request to the index_article_view function with a mock article data. It asserts that the response status code is 200.

elastic.urls module¶

elastic.views module¶

elastic.views.article_existant(article)[source]¶

Checks if an article exists in the index.

Args:

article (dict): The article to be checked.

Returns:

bool: True if the article exists, False otherwise.

elastic.views.delete_article_view(request)[source]¶

POST request to delete an article from the index.

Args:

request (HttpRequest): The HTTP request object.

Returns:

JsonResponse: The JSON response.

elastic.views.delete_favoris_document(request)[source]¶

Delete a favoris document from Elasticsearch.

Args:

request (HttpRequest): The HTTP request object.

Returns:

JsonResponse: A JSON response indicating the status of the deletion.

elastic.views.index_article(article)[source]¶

Indexes an article in the articles_scientifiques index.

Args:

article (dict): The article to be indexed.

Returns:

None

elastic.views.index_article_fav(article)[source]¶

Indexes an article in the Elasticsearch index for favorites.

Args:
article (dict): The article to be indexed. It should contain the following fields:

  • idArticle (str): The ID of the article.

  • idUser (str): The ID of the user.

Returns:

None

elastic.views.index_article_view(request)[source]¶

POST request to index a new article in Elasticsearch.

Args:

request (HttpRequest): The HTTP request object.

Returns:

JsonResponse: The JSON response.

elastic.views.index_article_view_fav(request)[source]¶

View function to index an article as a favorite in Elasticsearch.

Args:

request (HttpRequest): The HTTP request object.

Returns:

JsonResponse: A JSON response indicating the status of the indexing operation.

elastic.views.mettre_jour_article(request)[source]¶
elastic.views.recuperer_article(request)[source]¶

Retrieve all scientific articles from the index.

Args:

request: The HTTP request object.

Returns:

A JSON response containing the list of articles retrieved from the index. If the index is not found or there is an error in the request, an error message is returned.

elastic.views.retrieve_and_save_favorite_articles(request)[source]¶

Retrieve and save favorite articles based on the provided UserId.

Args:

request (HttpRequest): The HTTP request object.

Returns:
JsonResponse: A JSON response containing the search results of favorite articles.

If there are matches for the given UserId, it returns a list of corresponding articles. If there are no matches, it returns an empty list. If an error occurs during the retrieval and saving process, it returns an error message.

elastic.views.search_articles(request)[source]¶

GET request to get the search results.

Args:

request (HttpRequest): The HTTP request object.

Returns:

JsonResponse: The JSON response containing the search results.
